description: Demo calibration for OpenCV fisheye model (Kannalaâ€“Brandt). Use calibration from OpenCV cv::fisheye::calibrate or compatible source for real cameras.

notes.model: OpenCV fisheye (theta_d = theta * (1 + k1*theta^2 + k2*theta^4 + k3*theta^6 + k4*theta^8))
notes.k1TypicalRange: about -1.0 to 1.0 for OpenCV fisheye; do not use WoodScape/radial_poly coefficients (different model)
